title: Is a community tournament allowed 24 teams?
body: I have heard that tournaments with over 17 teams will award the top 4 teams with rp from riot. Are tournaments allowed 24 teams (4 groups with 6 teams as group stages) I always see 4, 8, 16 team tournaments but haven't seen a number out of that.

replies.body: As far as I'm aware, a tournament can have up to 31 teams!
